Action.author: JIRAUSER19955
Action.body: I wrote my package.json with reference to the packages described in the URL " https://hyperledger.github.io/fabric-chaincode-node/master/api/tutorial-using-contractinterface.html ". And in this page there is the code "dependencies": \{ "fabric-chaincode-api": "^1.4.0", "fabric-shim": "^1.4.0" }. So I believe that this code snippet has some inconsistency.
